alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 07 at 4:24AM AKDT until July 08 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNINGS REMAIN IN EFFECT FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 220, 221, 222, 223, AND 224... The potential for abundant lightning continues across the forecast area with 3000 to 5000 lightning strokes a day through Friday. This will be combined with extremely dry fuels and minimum RH values in the 25 to 35 percent range with fair overnight recovery. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKDT TONIGHT FOR LIGHTNING FOR YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS... * AFFECTED AREA...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * TIMING...Until Midnight AKDT tonight. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...West 5 to 10 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 30 percent. * TEMPERATURES...75 to 85. * IMPACTS...Ample lightning could lead to numerous new fire starts.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
